summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4669 for the improvement of 34th Avenue North from East Madison Street to East Valley Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54187, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
